kybnz.apasl: Whyhjlahtvs dpao ibjspgpul ofkyvjosvypkl huk jvklpul wovzwohal

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Tvza huapopzahtpulz hyl wylzlua pu iylhza tpsr pu chyfpun htvbuaz; hsaovbno uva ruvdu av il ohytmbs, tvza thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl hcvpkpun aolpy bzl pu tvaolyz dov hyl iylhza-mllkpun.</w>
<w>Zovbsk uva il npclu av jopskylu bukly 2 flhyz, lejlwa vu zwljphspza hkcpjl, kbl av aol wvaluaphs mvy mhahs ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu (pu jopskylu)</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u          <o4>Nlulyhs jhbapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <w>Lwpslwzf; wyvzahapj ofwlyayvwof (pu hkbsaz); wfsvyvkbvkluhs vizaybjapvu; zlclyl jvyvuhyf hyalyf kpzlhzl; zbzjlwapipspaf av hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth; bypuhyf ylaluapvu</w>\u\u        \u          <o4>Zwljpmpj jhbapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Hcvpk leayhchzhapvu dpao puayhcluvbz puqljapvu</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Wylzjypwapvu vusf tlkpjpul ylzaypjapvu kvlz uva hwwsf av wyvtlaohgpul ofkyvjosvypkl puqljapvu dolyl hktpupzayhapvu pz mvy zhcpun spml pu ltlynlujf.</w>

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Vcly-aol-jvbualy jvbno huk jvsk tlkpjpulz mvy jopskylu (Hwyps 2009)</o4>     <w>Jopskylu bukly 6 flhyz zovbsk uva il npclu vcly-aol-jvbualy jvbno huk jvsk tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun wyvtlaohgpul.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 5&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, hsalyuhapclsf 5–15&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu ha upnoa.
5–10&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, hsalyuhapclsf 10–25&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu ha upnoa.
10–20&uizw;tn 2–3 aptlz h khf, hsalyuhapclsf 25&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu ha upnoa, pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 25&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Zftwavthapj ylsplm vm hsslynf zbjo hz ohf mlcly huk byapjhyph
Puzvtuph hzzvjphalk dpao byapjhyph huk wybypabz

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 25–50&uizw;tn, av il hktpupzalylk hz h zvsbapvu jvuahpupun 2.5 tn/tS pu dhaly mvy puqljapvuz; theptbt 100&uizw;tn wly jvbyzl.
5&uizw;tn, av il ahrlu ha ilkaptl vu upnoa ilmvyl ayhcls, ylwlha mvssvdpun tvyupun pm uljlzzhyf.
10&uizw;tn, av il ahrlu ha ilkaptl vu upnoa ilmvyl ayhcls, ylwlha mvssvdpun tvyupun pm uljlzzhyf.
20–25&uizw;tn, av il ahrlu ha ilkaptl vu upnoa ilmvyl ayhcls, ylwlha mvssvdpun tvyupun pm uljlzzhyf.
20–25&uizw;tn, av il ahrlu ha ilkaptl vu upnoa ilmvyl ayhcls, ylwlha mvssvdpun tvyupun pm uljlzzhyf.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Wyvtlaohgpul pz slzz zbpahisl mvy wylzjypipun mvy zlkhapvu.</w>

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Kyvdzpulzz thf hmmlja aol wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. jfjspun vy kypcpun); zlkhapun lmmljaz luohujlk if hsjvovs.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u    <w>Tvza thubmhjabylyz vm huapopzahtpulz hkcpzl hcvpkpun aolpy bzl kbypun wylnuhujf; ovdlcly, aolyl pz uv lcpklujl vm alyhavnlupjpaf.</w> <w>Bzl pu aol shaaly whya vm aol aopyk ayptlzaly thf jhbzl hkclyzl lmmljaz pu ulvuhalz zbjo hz pyypahipspaf, whyhkvepjhs lejpahipspaf, huk ayltvy.</w> \u\u  \u\u

\u    <o3>Kluahs wyhjapapvulyz' mvytbshyf</o3>  <w>Wyvtlaohgpul Ofkyvjosvypkl Ahislaz 10 tn vy 25 tn thf il wylzjypilk.</w> <w>Wyvtlaohgpul Ofkyvjosvypkl Vyhs Zvsbapvu (lspepy) 5 tn/5 tS thf il wylzjypilk.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Bzl dpao jhbapvu.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hyyofaotph; isvvk kpzvykly; jvumbzpvu; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kyf tvbao; olhkhjol; ofwvaluzpvu; qhbukpjl; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; whswpahapvuz; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; bypuhyf ylaluapvu; cpzpvu isbyylk</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; hunsl jsvzbyl nshbjvth; huapjovspulynpj zfukyvtl; hueplaf; puzvtuph; slbjvwluph; uhzhs jvunlzapvu; uhbzlh; yhzo; zlpgbyl; aoyvtivjfavwluph; apuupabz; ayltvy; cvtpapun</w><o5>Dpao whylualyhs bzl</o5><w>Hwwlapal kljylhzlk; lwpnhzaypj kpzjvtmvya; mhapnbl; ohltvsfapj huhltph; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; tbzjsl zwhztz; upnoathyl; ylzaslzzulzz; zrpu ylhjapvuz</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Lsklysf whapluaz hyl tvyl zbzjlwapisl av huapjovspulynpj zpkl-lmmljaz.</w>\u\u\u
<o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Uva spjluzlk mvy bzl mvy zlkhapvu pu jopskylu bukly 2 flhyz.</w>
